DOC.brief_summary: Chronic rhinitis without an allergic or infectious aetiology (vasomotor rhinitis) is a common disease for which there are only poor therapeutic treatment options. The current placebo controlled partially double blinded pilot study evaluated the effects of acupuncture on the symptoms of vasomotor rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Acupuncture on Vasomotor Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: term of sickness > 3 month negative allergic testing term of sickness < 3 month previous nasal surgeries polyposis nasi contraindications regarding acupuncture (such as: risk of bleeding, pregnancy) psychologic disorders drug addiction autoimmune disease other severe disease
